sentences.english: At 10.30 pm we'll depart for our first night of aurora viewing.
sentences.chinese: 晚上10点半出发，开始第1个极光观赏之夜。

sentences.english: Even with perfect viewing conditions, the lights are notoriously hit or miss.
sentences.chinese: 尽管天气条件很好，北极光却是来无影去无踪。

sentences.english: Power law probability distributions of multiscale auroral dynamics from ground - based TV observations.
sentences.chinese: 根据陆基TV观测多尺度极光动力学的幂律概率分布。

sentences.english: Also sometimes we ca powerful see the " North Pole light" .
sentences.chinese: 同时还有极昼极夜景象并且有时能看到北极光。

sentences.english: As to auroral hiss, there are upper and lower frequency cut-offs.
sentences.chinese: 极光嘶声则有明显的上截止频率和下截止频率。

sentences.english: The Aurora is the perfect little shoe for those long hours on your feet.
sentences.chinese: 极光是完美的小鞋你的脚长时间。

sentences.english: The aurora borealis over mountains in Ulsfjord, Norway.
sentences.chinese: 该图所示的是摄于挪威乌尔斯约德山上的北极光。

sentences.english: And don't let the aurora borealis fool you.
sentences.chinese: 所以不要被北极光给蒙蔽了双眼。

sentences.english: Aurora Borealis (Northern Lights) colours the night sky through a silhouetted forest.
sentences.chinese: 北极光染红了夜空，透出了森林的轮廓。

sentences.english: Humans mostly see auroras in shades of yellowish-green.
sentences.chinese: 人们看到最多的是黄绿色的极光。

sentences.english: Deng Feng of aurora borealis copartner thinks.
sentences.chinese: 北极光合伙人邓峰认为。

sentences.english: It is possible that the auroral oval shifts southerly and hence produces this effect in winter .
sentences.chinese: 这可能是由于冬季极光卵向南偏移造成的。

sentences.english: Seen from the shores of Lake Superior, an August 4 aurora glows green topped with blueish-purple.
sentences.chinese: 8月4日苏必利尔湖上的下绿上紫的极光。

sentences.english: At last, this paper uses three semi-supervised learning algorithms to classify the static aurora images.
sentences.chinese: 最后实现了基于半监督学习的静态极光图像分类实验。

sentences.english: The appearance of the lights also predicted bad weather.
sentences.chinese: 而且，极光的出现也预示着坏天气的来临。

sentences.english: High-latitude sky watchers should be alert for auroras.
sentences.chinese: 位于高纬度的天空观察者应该小心极光。

definition: the North Pole/the Arctic Pole/the north magnetic pole
